snippet: There is no sign yet that summit meetings in the region will make progress on resolving the dispute over Beijing’s claim to sovereignty.
abstract: Editorial underscores importance of peaceful resolution in dispute between China and other Asian nations about free flow of navigation through South China Sea; calls on Asian leaders participating in summit meeting in Malaysia to endorse case brought by Philippines against China at international court of arbitration.
lead_paragraph: There is no sign yet that summit meetings in the region will make progress on resolving the dispute over Beijing’s claim to sovereignty.

headline.print_headline: Brinkmanship in the South China Sea
headline.main: Brinkmanship in the South China Sea
